ygData.subject: Disposition chain of Heritrix 3
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi list, I am currently experimenting with Heritrix 3. Before that I was using Heritrix 1.14. With the new version it seams that I cannot attach a DecideRule

Hi list,

I am currently experimenting with Heritrix 3. Before that I was u=
sing Heritrix 1.14. With the new version it seams that I cannot attach a De=
cideRule to the DIsposition chain, can I? So far we have used this feature =
store only HTML files of successful connections. Is there any other way to =
do this?

Cheers,
Daniel
